data.text: Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ná-kizo fai lɛɛzu,
É ɠizɛni ná-nuɓɔɠɔlai zu, ta ná-wooɠɛɠiladai Izilayɛle ná-pɛlɛyeɠei ʋɛ.
Eteai zu nuɓusɛiti kpein à wooɠula ga koozunɛɛi Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ,
À Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maamusɛ ga papai wooi,
À maamusɛ ga puʋu gooi, ta baala minɛ ʋuʋugi wooi,
Kpoloɗɛi zikɔ, ta bu aniiti kpein,
